title: Making Daylight-Saving Time Permanent: What to Know About the Bill Passed by the Senate
sub_head: Bill to end the annual ‘spring forward’ tradition now goes to House leadership
body:
The effort to make daylight-saving time a permanent fixture got a boost Tuesday, when Senators passed a bipartisan bill that seeks to put an end to the annual changing of the clocks.
The tradition of setting clocks forward in the spring for daylight-saving time and backward in the fall to standard time has been a source of debate and consternation for decades.
